Scrying Glass

Capture a photo of any Magic: The Gathering card, and Scrying Glass will swiftly analyze and identify the card, granting you instant access to a wealth of related information.

RSS Discord Bot

A Discord bot that allows users to subscribe to RSS feeds and receive updates in their Discord server.
